Stop thinking about us as if we're white people with a quirk. Stop treating Judaism like it's a country club membership.
The White House issued a statement about the Holocaust that intentionally omitted mention of Jews. An Antisemite is pulling Trump's strings.
@geo_megs (this is not to minimize things, of course. This is a big awful deal.)
@geo_megs This is horrifying but not really unprecedented.
@geo_megs Pretty terrifying, but also the truth is that many synagogues hire security staff for the high holidays, if not all year round.
17 Jewish Community Centers received coordinated bomb threats today. This is the third wave of threats in the past month.
Hey @MargHartmann, this kind of writing is not funny or snarky anymore. It's fucking dangerous.
Even if Trump is taking advantage of Jared & Ivanka's absences to be totally horrible on Saturdays, HOLY FUCK DO NOT SAY SHABBAT IS AN ALIBI

This movie was made months ago, when it wasn't triggering as fuck to see huge swastikas onscreen with no warning. https://t.co/8ioS1vdtsk
And for the record, the movies of 2017 are gonna be awkward as fuck because they were made in a political environment that no longer exists.
Even your dumbest, silliest pop songs and popcorn movies are a reflection of the political environment. That's just how art works.
It's okay, Strawman ArtFan. Artists are disappointed in you, too.
I love seeing fans tsk-tsk artists and say "I'm disappointed in you for bringing politics into it, I just wanted to enjoy what you make"
If you're scolding your fave artist for being political then buddy I have some bad news about literally the entire history of all art ever.

I'm just shaking and gasping. I need to get back to doing homework but I want to punch something.
There's a pit full of human ashes at Majdanek. I saw the top of a femur. How fucking DARE YOU erase this.
When I was 15 I went to Auschwitz and didn't feel a thing. Turns out that I wasn't numb, just waiting. 13 years of fury happening right now.
You don't get to tell this story. You don't get to talk about Israel or Jews as if we matter to you other than as pawns and tokens.
I never want to hear you speak the name of my people, my homeland, or my history ever again.
I don't even have the words for how upsetting this is. How DARE you. You pathetic little men. How FUCKING DARE YOU.
I'm going to scream until I throw up. https://t.co/ipaEsHyK4q

This shouldn't actually be controversial, BTW. Genocide is bad. Don't do it. https://t.co/TQKwjuyabR
@Alatriyana I burst into tears at the movies yesterday because I wasn't expecting to see Nazis in a movie trailer. It's fucking terrifying.
@kaytaylorrea Writing fluff and sweet romance is literally getting me through this.
I can't really articulate myself other than that right now.
This was a real fucking thing that really happened to people who are still fucking alive.
But the first trailer was for The Zookeeper's Wife, and I burst into tears when I realized what it was about. That's never happened before.
Just saw Arrival and it was really incredible.
and also a digital download so I can put the movie on my phone. Fuck it I have no regrets
I'm only questioning my life choices a little bit. This is the 25th anniversary version. It has voice cast recording footage.
